Articles.Content:
Hey I have just started modding my game and i have come across an issue where decouplers and a lot of other items such as rockets and a few fuel tanks only connect when upside down. Any help with this would be appreciated. 

Here is a example of what i am talking about.![0F4D09007A760114BCA5722BE1B57963CFCA94AD](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45377511656539381/0F4D09007A760114BCA5722BE1B57963CFCA94AD/)
